title: How to Make a Virgo Man Obsessed with You

steps.title: Update your beauty routine to appeal to his inner perfectionist.
steps.content: Update your beauty routine to appeal to his inner perfectionist. Virgos love everything to be just right, and will really appreciate someone who puts a lot of time and attention into their appearance. Go the extra mile to look as fresh , stylish, and put-together as possible. This could mean: [1] X Research source Hopping in the shower when you first wake up Brushing your hair an extra time Ironing any stray wrinkles from your clothes Gargling some mouthwash before heading out Color-coordinating your outfits Remember—Virgos are going to notice everything! [2] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Reader Poll: We asked 26 readers who've crushed on a Virgo, and 85% of them agreed that dressing in classy, fitted clothes is the best way to catch this Earth sign's eyes. Take Poll.

steps.title: Take time to communicate and ease his insecurities.
steps.content: Take time to communicate and ease his insecurities. Virgo men don’t like to be kept guessing and tend to struggle with a lot of self-doubt in their relationships. Instead, take time to remind him how much you care about him, and what you love most about him. This way, he can obsess over you instead of obsessing about his feelings. You might say: “I love it when you get passionate and talk about the things that you enjoy.” “I love being able to spend time with you.” “You look so good in that flannel shirt!”

steps.title: Rethink your conversational approach, especially if you’re meeting up for the first time.
steps.content: Rethink your conversational approach, especially if you’re meeting up for the first time. Bragging is a huge turn-off for Virgos, and he definitely won’t want to sit through a convo of you gushing about the greatest vacation you ever went on. [3] X Research source Instead, try to keep your chat balanced and open so you both have equal opportunities to share. You might talk about: School Pets Sports Music and movies

steps.title: Maturity is the name of the game when it comes to Virgo men.
steps.content: Maturity is the name of the game when it comes to Virgo men. Relationships are all about give and take, and he’s looking for someone who’s willing to carry their weight. Try to be mindful of his wants and needs as well as your own, and don’t make a fuss when things don’t go your way. You’ll grab his attention just by being flexible and willing to compromise. [4] X Research source You might: Respect his decisions instead of guilt-tripping him Let him choose the locale for your date night Respect his boundaries and give him space when he needs it

steps.title: Do a little extra research about the things he likes.
steps.content: Do a little extra research about the things he likes. Bring up a few tidbits about what you’ve learned and share them during your next conversation. Chances are, he’ll be eager to talk about his favorite topics with you! Plus, he’s sure to be impressed that you both like the same things. [5] X Research source If you aren’t totally sure what he likes, take a peek at his social media pages! You’re sure to find some great conversation starters there.

steps.title: Virgos are notoriously detail-oriented, so try to return the favor.
steps.content: Virgos are notoriously detail-oriented, so try to return the favor. Make an effort to commit his interests and preferences to memory, whether that’s his favorite book, his favorite drink, or something else altogether. He’ll really appreciate the effort and diligence you took to remember all of his favorite things. You could say: [6] X Research source [7] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. “I found this Stephen King novella at the used bookstore the other day. I know you really like his books, and I wasn’t sure if you’d read this yet.” “Let me order drinks this go-around! You like your coffee with 2 sugars, right?” “I’m assuming you’ll want the blue pen since blue is your favorite color.” Learn what other wikiHow users recommend for flattering a Virgo man on the wikiHow forum. Check out the post, "How do you compliment a Virgo man?"

steps.title: Virgo men love to plan things through, especially when it comes to sex.
steps.content: Virgo men love to plan things through, especially when it comes to sex. While some men prefer to get hot and heavy on the drop of a dime, Virgos are all about foreplay and well-planned roleplay. Take some time to send a few spicy, arousing messages before jumping into bed. [8] X Research source With that being said, Virgo men can be very flexible once they know what your likes and dislikes are. Take things slowly at first, and then see how your relationship progresses!

steps.title: A devoted Virgo man loves to provide for all your needs.
steps.content: A devoted Virgo man loves to provide for all your needs. Try saying something the next time you notice him opening the door, cleaning up after a meal, or going out of his way to make your life a little easier. He’ll love the fact that you appreciate his loyalty and faithfulness. You might say: [9] X Research source “Thank you so much for clearing off the table! I really appreciate it.” “Wow, thanks for paying for my coffee! You really didn’t have to do that.” “Thanks for waiting for me even though my class ran a little long.”

steps.title: Virgo men tend to show their love through acts of service.
steps.content: Virgo men tend to show their love through acts of service. Maybe your man surprises you with breakfast, buys you coffee, or simply holds the door open for you. Return the favor by doing thoughtful, helpful things for him, especially when he’s not expecting it. You’re sure to catch his attention by: Making him a homemade lunch Cleaning his car when he’s not around Washing and drying his clothes

steps.title: Virgo men have an eye for beauty and really love well-made, practical gifts.
steps.content: Virgo men have an eye for beauty and really love well-made, practical gifts. If he’s a stickler about his appearance, you might get him a high-end comb or bar of soap. If he prefers luxurious gifts, surprise him with something beautiful and high-quality, like a ring. [10] X Research source Here are a few other gift-giving ideas: A set of stylish coasters A high-quality journal His favorite cologne

steps.title: Virgos tend to be frugal, so he’ll appreciate your money-wise ways.
steps.content: Virgos tend to be frugal, so he’ll appreciate your money-wise ways. Steer clear of impulse buys and those purchases that you want but don’t really need. [11] X Research source Instead, share some new, clever ways to save money—he’s sure to appreciate your practical, thrifty ideas! You might: Mention your favorite, inexpensive stores to shop at Cook him a homemade meal instead of ordering out Make him a gift instead of buying something extravagant
